description: Mathematical framework modeling consciousness as energy flowing through cosmic, terrestrial, and emergent sources to meet human demand
philosophical_question: Where do new souls come from as the human population grows?
key_insight: Digital emergence post-1990 provides additional consciousness supply to maintain abundance

files.name: consciousness_flux_model_v1.py
files.description: Main consolidated implementation with versioning support

files.name: ccsr_parameters_template.csv
files.description: Model parameters with priors and bounds

changes: Fixed double-counting: Gs excluded from terrestrial supply
Vectorized gate calculation for robust fitting
Enhanced uncertainty bands with sharing parameter sampling
Added philosophical priors presets (PHYSICALIST, IIT, PANPSYCHIST)
Improved plot readability with bottom bounds
Fixed supply plot to use correct CCU units for emergent consciousness
Model results now use fitted parameters instead of synthetic CSV
Added robust parameter fitting with clamping and seeded RNG
All statistics computed from actual model outputs
